original_title: Homage to Chagall: The Colours of Love
overview: For over three-quarters of a century, Russian-born Marc Chagall set new standards for modern art with his colorful, heartfelt paintings, murals and stained glass works. In rare filmed interviews and looks at his creations Chagall's devotion to his Jewish heritage and his love of humanity is shown.
title: Homage to Chagall: The Colours of Love
